actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to require that the President submit to Congress a balanced budget for each fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to require that any budget submitted by the President not be in deficit. Provides that if the President determines that a balanced budget is not feasible, and submits written reasons in support of such determination, then the President may submit two budgets, one in compliance and one in deficit.

titles.title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to require that the President submit to Congress a balanced budget for each fiscal year.
